akas: Horror Trips - Katastrophe im Urlaub Germany
akas from release info: Horror Trips - Katastrophe im Urlaub Germany

-1.title: Episode dated 3 June 2012
-1.plot: Taipei, Taiwan: A man climbs into a lion den; Grande Prairie, Alberta: A chuck wagon racer falls off the wagon and is dragged underneath it; Masai Mara, Kenya: A family on a safari record a vehicle carrying other tourists being turned over in a swollen stream that they are trying to cross; Hughada, Egypt: Two boats carrying tourists collide; Florence, Arizona: A haboub, a massive dust storm, intrudes on a couple's wedding; Daughin, Pennsylvania: A lovestruck deer attacks a woman.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: LAX airport: A JetBlue flight tries to land with the front landing gear stuck sideways; Carrizo Canyon, San Diego: A mountain biker falls 200 feet down a mountain trail; Sull, Austria: A gust of wind blows a hang glider into power lines; A camper driving an SUV rolls over when he negotiates a narrow ledge; Park City, Utah: A 12-year-old's backpack gets snagged on a ski-lift, suspending him in mid-air; Two safari riders witness two giraffes fighting for dominance; Half Moon Bay, Portland, Oregon: A maverick wave pounds beach-goers as it comes ashore; Katmai National ...

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: New Port Richey, Florida: A gator wrestler is bitten; Albuquerque, New Mexico: A balloon hits a power line, sending the gondola crashing to the ground; Glamis Dunes, California: A four-wheeler crashes into a parked car; A shark pulls a fisherman into the water; Yosemite, California: A rock climber drops 65 feet, ending up dangling by his rope; Bingley, UK: A man pulling a camper gets it stuck; Two camels giving tourists rides at Giza start fighting.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Staten Island, New York: A Marine Corps Osprey at a Memorial Day air show buffets spectators as it passes overhead; Sichuan Province, China: Visitors to a Panda Reserve are caught in a 7.7 earthquake; Rome, Italy: Tourists are trapped in a burning hotel; Stoddard Valley, California: A couple is offroading in an SUV that stalls up a steep hill and starts tumbling; Malibu, California: A shark fisherman is hooked in the chin by another fisherman's fishing lure; New Paltz, New York: Two bystanders jump into a reservoir to rescue a fawn that has fallen in; A man swinging ...

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Stuart, Florida: A pilot-less boat is headed for a group of snorkelers; Rantoul, Illinois: A skydiver's chute gets snagged on the airplane's tail; Guadalupe Island, Mexico: Two divers become trapped in a shark cage with a great white; Albuquerque, New Mexico: A hot air balloon carrying two boys crashes into a radio tower, leaving them and the pilot to climb down the inside ladder; Chesapeake, Virginia: A couple cruising upriver in a boat crashes into an electric power line; Vail, Colorado: A snowboarder is seriously injured in a jump; Chilecito, Argentina: An accident...

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Elko, Nevada: A helicopter on a rescue mission goes out of control and crashes near a campsite; Marietta, South Carolina: A woman is injured when the branch holding a rope swing snaps; Canoers on the Zambezi are attacked by a mother elephant protecting her calf; SMoky Mountain National Park: Two motorcyclists crash into an oncoming truck; Macchu Pichu: Hikers are caught in a flash flood; Romsdalen, Norway: A gust of wind blows a BASE jumper into a cliff; Birds of Eden Reserve, South Africa: A cockatoo attacks tourists.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Alberta, Canada: A CF-18 Hornet at an air show stalls and crashes; Moreton Bay, Australia: A boat is pounded by waves after it loses power; Tin Cup, Colorado: A vacationer is caught between two ATVs; Quebec, Canada: A fire-breather gets burned by a fireball; Bali, Indonesia: A monkey bites a kid's leg; Tanna Island: Vacationers endure a bumpy ride and lava bombs from an erupting volcano; Johannesburg, South Africa: A male ostrich courting a female chases a truck.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Alpine, Utah: A family driving on vacation in Utah narrowly escapes a wildfire. Cairns, Australia: An adrenaline junkie is pushed into deep water while still attached to a shopping cart. British Columbia: An octopus latches onto a diver's mask. Skookumchuck Rapids, British Columbia: A kayak enthusiast tries to save a crewman on a sinking tugboat. Key West, Florida: A man riding an electric scooter crashes. Saint Marks, Florida: A fisherman is attacked by a wild goose.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Waukesha County, Wisconsin: A woman returning with her two children from the county fair is trapped inside her burning vehicle when it hits a tree and catches fire; Plymouth, Minnesota: A snow tuber lands on the back of her neck; Aniak, Alaska: A small plane in bush country crashes on takeoff; Moab, Utah: Newlyweds attempting to drive down Lion's Back lose control of their vehicle; Corsica, France: A mountain kayaker goes over a waterfall and ends up trapped upside down; Boston, Massachusetts: A college student walking through a bog with some friends sinks in mud ...

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Whistler, British Columbia: A dog's owner watches as the dog tumbles down a ski slope; Mt. Baldy, California: A cliff jumper is injured after a 75-foot leap into a shallow pool; The couple in a powerboat are thrown out after making a sharp turn; A harrier jet at an air show stalls and drops into the water; Masaya Volcano National Park, Nicaragua: A volcano unexpectedly starts erupting in front of onlookers; Jackson Hole, Wyoming: A motorist's windshield is knocked out while driving through a hailstorm; Wabash River, Indiana: Boaters have to dodge Asian carp as the ...

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A day of sun and fun at the beach turns into sheer panic when a harrier jet falls out of the sky and crashes into the ocean. A cliff diving trip goes horribly wrong when a man leaps before he looks and hits rock bottom.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: It's the story you haven't heard about the other heroes who survived "The Miracle on the Hudson". And a pilot whale grabs a diver who has nothing but fins and a snorkel, and the whale is heading straight to the bottom of the sea.

imdb.title: When Vacations Attack

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: _When Vacations Attack_ (qv)! takes you back to first hand accounts of these unforgettable stories caught on tape, from the very people who lived to tell them.
